data.title: What channel is Rangers v Sparta Prague Europa League match on? TV coverage, live stream and kick-off time
data.meta_description: Check out how to watch Rangers v Sparta Prague in the Europa League, including TV channel, live stream coverage and kick-off time.
data.text:
You could argue this is a more important game, however, as Europa League Group C is on a knife edge.

Rangers are third in the standings after earning four points from three games, and the Light Blues need to win to realistically stand a chance of topping the table and avoiding the play-off round that awaits the runners-up.

Watch Rangers v Sparta Prague on TNT Sports via discovery+ Premium monthly pass or discovery+

Sparta Prague are ahead of Rangers in the group on goals scored, and head to Scotland off the back of successive victories over city rivals Bohemians 1905 in the league and cup.

More like this

The visitors will be without captain Ladislav Krejčí, though, who has missed the last five games in all competitions due to injury.

RadioTimes.com has rounded up everything you need to know about how to watch Rangers v Sparta Prague on TV and online.

Read more football features: Best players in the world | Best players of all time | Live football on TV today | Premier League TV schedule | Championship TV schedule

When is Rangers v Sparta Prague?

Rangers v Sparta Prague will take place on Thursday 9th November 2023.

Check out our live football on TV guide for the latest times and information.

Rangers v Sparta Prague kick-off time

Rangers v Sparta Prague will kick off at 8pm.

What TV channel is Rangers v Sparta Prague on?

The game will be shown live on TNT Sports 3 from 7:45pm.

There are multiple ways to get TNT Sports. If you already have BT Broadband, you can add TNT Sports to your existing contract from just £18 per month. You can add the ‘Big Sport’ package for £40 per month which includes all TNT Sports and 11 Sky Sports channels via a NOW pass.

Check out the latest deals for TNT Sports

How to live stream Rangers v Sparta Prague online

You can watch the match on TNT Sports via discovery+ Premium monthly pass or on discovery+ via Amazon Prime Video without signing up to a contract.

Regular subscribers can also stream matches on a variety of devices including laptops, smartphones and tablets via the discovery+ app.

discovery+ is the new streaming home of TNT Sports, showing events including live Premier League, UEFA Champions League, Premiership Rugby, UFC, Boxing and MotoGP. Learn more here: discoveryplus.com

Listen to Rangers v Sparta Prague on radio

Unfortunately, the match has not been selected for live radio commentary in the UK.
